column5: Will be Flying into the Chapleau Game preserve in September to fish Bonar Lake for a week with Air Ivanhoe I have done several fly ins in the past with Air Ivanhoe and they have always been great trips just wondering if anyone on the board has ever fished Bonar Lake and what there experience was like.  Cheers Mitch
Yes.  Well over 20 years ago.  Lots of walleye, some jumbo perch.  I remember fishing was fantastic when storm fronts would move in.  I think we average about 15 eyes per person/day.
